user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable and supportive underwear that would be suitable for daily wear.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that would provide all-day support and ventilation. The features like the cooling channels and ergonomic design appealed to me, as I prioritize comfort in my daily wear. However, my review indicates that while they met my basic needs, they didn't exceed my expectations, leading to a neutral sentiment in my feedback.

I needed a reliable and comfortable option for everyday use. The tagless design and soft waistband were significant factors for me, as I wanted to avoid irritation. The positive review and high rating influenced my decision, confirming that this product would likely meet my needs effectively.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are well-made, durable, and comfortable, especially those that offer good value for money. I appreciate items that are designed with quality materials and craftsmanship, as well as those that are lightweight and suitable for various seasons. Additionally, I tend to favor brands that have a strong reputation for authenticity and reliability. On the other hand, I dislike products that are made in regions where I perceive a decline in quality, particularly when compared to previous manufacturing locations. I also find poor sizing and fit to be frustrating, especially if it leads to a need for returns. Overall, I value comfort, quality, and a fair price in my purchases.

conversation.content: I want comfortable and supportive daily underwear. within my expected price range: [21.98, 23.98]
What specific size or material do you prefer for your daily underwear?
I prefer underwear that is made of soft and breathable materials and comes in a size that fits comfortably.
What do you prefer in terms of the design or style of the daily underwear you are looking for?
I generally prefer underwear made of soft and breathable materials in a design that offers comfort and support for daily wear.

I prefer simple and solid colors for my daily underwear.

Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Panties, Cotton Brief Underwear Multi-Pack (Retired Options)> / Item ID: B0BRJSSTPD / Price: $17.44 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If briefs are your style, you can't do better than Hanes® best lightweight cotton briefs. This comfy brief underwear is made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. Plus these undies are made of ring-spun cotton that's oh so soft against your skin. You'll also appreciate the plush waistband that won't pinch or bind. The silhouette is a classic brief with full coverage in front and back plus a high-rise waist for a sleek, smooth look under clothes. These lightweight briefs have comfort leg bands that stay in place without riding up and are available in a convenient 3-pack of assorted colors. Even better, these classic brief undies are tagless for itch-free comfort."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Rosette Women’s Sleeveless Undershirt - Cotton – High Neck, Full shoulder design> / Item ID: B07BTSGMCV / Price: $11.98 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Tops Tees & Blouses', 'Tanks & Camis'] / Description: ['From the cradle to the coffin, underwear comes first!', 'As underwear is hidden beneath clothing, it is easy to believe that it does not require much forethought and that anything will do. But that is untrue, you not only need something that looks nice, but more importantly something that offers ultimate comfort.Your underwear should feel good and not distract from activity your taking part in.', 'GENERAL FEATURES:', 'Made of 100% Extra fine durable, soft Cotton for superior comfort Classic fit, perfect for layering Available in many sizes & colors (Check size chart above) Full shoulder design for a conservative appearance High neckline for a Modest Coverage Machine wash warm. Tumble dry low', 'Comfort + Quality + Style', "The Rosette Sleeveless Tank Top Undershirt is a must-have in any women's closet. The extra soft cotton material allows for all day wear during any type of activity, whether you're at the office or at home.Full shouldered tank straps conceal bra straps for a more put together look. With high neckline, great for anyone looking for extended coverage. They are very stretchy with a Nice ribbon trim around the neck and arms.", 'Natural Cotton – Eco-Friendly', 'Ideal for women with Sensitive skin and Sensory issues. Great for Sleeping, Lounging, Pajamas and Just for layering, or plain wearing clean finish bottom to wear tucked in or tucked out with the everyday essentials.', 'Get it, Feel it, Prove it!', 'Get the Rosette’s top rated tank shirt for ladies and girls today by clicking “Add to Cart” on top of the page and feel the difference.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Maidenform Women's Tame Your Tummy Shaping Lace Brief with Cool Comfort Dm0051> / Item ID: B0BTQ5MYJG / Price: $12.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you're looking for firm control shapewear with all-day comfort, you've found it with Maidenform®'s firm control briefs from the Tame Your Tummy collection. The brief silhouette, available with allover fabric or with a pretty stretch lace panty, is designed with a wide, toning waist panel for all-around smoothing that's effective yet comfortable. This firm control panty has a Smart Comfort® waistband that won't roll, dig or pinch, plus it's made with Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks moisture away from your skin to help you stay cool and dry. And it has a cotton-lined gusset for added comfort. You'll be delighted with the comfort of this firm control brief shaper that you can really wear all day long."]
